title: SOLD: N172 McGunnigle (Brooklyn mgr) SGC 10 nice strong image!
author: scooter729

posts.post_title: SOLD: N172 McGunnigle (Brooklyn mgr) SGC 10 nice strong image!
posts.post_content:
Hi - I'm selling the pictured N172 OJ of Brooklyn Bridegrooms manager Bill McGunnigle.  The card has been graded an SGC 10, though the front presents much, much better, with a strong image and no real flaws.  

The SGC 10 grade has been assigned for some light paper loss on the back, as I don't really see anything else going on with the card (maybe a light wrinkle visible on the back?)  

Send me a PM with your email, and I can send you a better hi-res pic of the card if you would like.

Price is SOLD delivered - PayPal or check fine by me.

Thanks for looking!
Scott
